NAME: ReactPoll
AUTHOR: FlapJack
brandons209
SHORT: Create polls using reactions as the responses
DESCRIPTION:
Create polls using reactions as the responses. Even works for mobile users because you do not need to add reactions to participate. Poll duration can also be customized.

Modified by Brandons209 from the v2 version to also include the removed functionality of managing reactions on the message.
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing ReactPoll. Please make sure your bot has the 'Manage Messages' permission so it can manage emoji reactions on messages.
end_user_data_statement: This cog won't store user data.
